wxColourPropertyValue Struct Reference

Because text, background and other colours tend to differ between platforms, wxColourProperty must be able to select between system colour and, when necessary, to pick a custom one. wxColourProperty value makes this possible. More...

#include <propertygrid.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

wxUint32 m_type
 Any of wxSYS_COLOUR_XXX, or any web-colour ( use wxPG_TO_WEB_COLOUR macro - (currently unsupported) ), or wxPG_COLOUR_CUSTOM.

wxColour m_colour
 Resulting colour.

Detailed Description

Because text, background and other colours tend to differ between platforms, wxColourProperty must be able to select between system colour and, when necessary, to pick a custom one. wxColourProperty value makes this possible.

Member Data Documentation

wxColour wxColourPropertyValue::m_colour
 

Resulting colour.

Should be correct regardless of type.
